title: OB-GYN Residency Programs Face Tough Choice on Abortion Training
description: Many residency programs for obstetricians and gynecologists are in a risky position, caught between state abortion bans and accreditation requirements.
dc:creator: Jan Hoffman
media:credit: Morgan Hornsby for The New York Times
media:description: Dr. Nikki Zite, a professor at a University of Tennessee OB-GYN residency program, worries that top-tier candidates will not apply there because abortions cannot be performed in the state.
